item.description:
I am not sure I can make this one, so I hesitated scheduling it. I think we have enough regulars that it won't be an issue. With regards to the fees, whenever I see you again is fine. If I am not there, the court manager will come around, and if he doesnt, consider yourself lucky and get the hell out of there before he comes!
That fee is like a third of a gallon of gas!!!!

It may be hot, but thats what ice cream afterwards is for!

Changed to Wednesday.
item.how_to_find_us: Call me if you get lost 203-710-6831
item.why: It is one of your life goals (have a good career, a nice home, join a tennis group).

group.name: Tennis Meetup of New Haven and Fairfield Counties

item.name: Monday(err....Wednesday) Tennis
